p: The cytotoxicity and anti-cancer activity of the isolates of the wood of M. leucantha Kurz was evaluated against NCI-H187, BCA-1and KB tumour cell lines where, physcion showed potent anti-cancer activity against the NCI-H187 cell lines (IC 50 value 4.30 μg/mL) and millettinol also showed significant activity against BCA-1 cell lines (IC 50 value 3.44 μg/mL) ( Rayanil et al., 2011).
